Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.phase.action

Class ActionPhaseState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.phase.action.ActionPhaseState
Direct Known Subclasses:
CharacterCard, Finalize, Influence, MergeIsland, MotherNatureState, StudentMovement
public abstract class ActionPhaseState extends Object
Models the abstract and most general ActionPhase state, keeping track of the "context" class.
